::Hot Rod::

He ducks, allowing the swords to clash together, above him. He then sent
a uppercut towards Sharpedges mid section.
"I have terminating your kind since the first great war between the
Autobots and the Decepticons. Galvatron wasn't a problem, and neither
are you!"

::Dollen::

He woke up, laying on a rock surface. He remembered the fall. He seemed
to be pretty far down. He opened a link.
"Hello? StarScream, you read?"

OOC: Angel Prime, Demolition is in plane mode, attempting to crash into
you.
